recipe.title: No-Bake Strawberry Cheesecake
ingredients: 1 pound fresh strawberries, hulled and halved lengthwise
instructions: 1. Beat the cream cheese until smooth with an electric mixer. Gradually beat in the sugar. Beat in the sour cream and vanilla until just combined. Fold in the whipped topping. Scrape mixture into the piecrust. (There may be some fi lling left over. If so, reserve it to be decoratively piped onto the top of the pie.) Chill in the refrigerator for 4 hours. 2. Starting in the center, arrange the strawberries in a circular pattern. Pipe with extra filling, if desired.
